instruction: Write a NASM x86-64 Linux program that exits with code 42.
Write a NASM x86-64 Linux program that exits with code 7.
Write a NASM x86-64 Linux program that prints exactly 'Hello, World!\n'.
Write a NASM x86-64 Linux program that prints exactly 'OK\n'.
Compute 7 * 8 and exit with that value as status code.
Compute 20 + 22 and exit with that value as status code.
Sum numbers from 1 to 5 and exit with the result as status code.
Sum numbers from 1 to 10 and exit with the result as status code.
